job.body:
Total vacancies:2725

Name of the Vacancies:

  • Store Guard, Laboratory Scientist Officer, Pharmaceutical Officer, Staff Nurse, Junior Clerk & Other (Group C) vacancies

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Graduates have been published by Public Health Dept  for Store Guard vacancies in Maharashtra. If you are searching for a government job in Maharashtra then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Store Guard, from 06-08-2021, and till 20-08-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Maharashtra and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a Store Guard in NHM, your Graduation must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 06-08-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 20-08-2021 at 12:00 PM

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

NHM Store Guard Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for NHM Maharashtra Jr Clerk, Staff Nurse & Other (Group C) Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Store Guard. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of NHM and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by NHM
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.

Download Official notification pdf.
